ARGUMENT

| 6 | 4, 5, 2, 3 | #P_ablcntzd | |- ( ( G e. Abel /\ T e. ( SubGrp ` G ) /\ U e. ( SubGrp ` G ) ) -> T C_ ( ( Cntz ` G ) ` U ) ) |
| 7 | 1, 4 | #P_lsmsubg | |- ( ( T e. ( SubGrp ` G ) /\ U e. ( SubGrp ` G ) /\ T C_ ( ( Cntz ` G ) ` U ) ) -> ( T .(+) U ) e. ( SubGrp ` G ) ) |
